item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a VERY SPECIAL meetup in RHODE ISLAND!!

The Warwick City Dog Park is located at the end of Asylum Rd. in Warwick, RI. More info about the park can be found here: http://www.facebook.c... I've never been here but from what I've read, there is a separate area for large & small dogs...we'll meet in the small dog area.

NUTRO is sponsoring our group thru November 2nd so meetup dues are on them.

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us in the small dog area.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: BARKtober French Bulldog Meetup - in RHODE ISLAND!
